sent.orig: What is at the heart of the heart of the heart of the heart?
sent.trans: 你的心里的心里的心里的心里是什么？

sent.orig: Except an exhausted heart the numb heart, you also have the heart which feels grateful?
sent.trans: 除了一颗疲惫的心，麻木的心，你还有一颗感恩的心吗？

sent.orig: A Three hearts women: Leaving your heart at home; Have grieving heart; Have a disgusting heart.
sent.trans: 三心女人，在家里放心，想起来伤心，看起来恶心。

sent.orig: Method Though the means of observation and heart-to-heart talking, 22cases were studied on their psychological stimulus-reaction.
sent.trans: 方法采用有目的观察法和谈心两种途径，对22例SARS疑似患儿父母出现的心理应激反应进行分析。

sent.orig: Let us heart to heart, hand in hand to create success!
sent.trans: 让我们心连心，手拉手，共创成功！
